title: Outputing Strings
description: Now that you have a basic understanding of strings, you will now learn how to output strings. In order to output a string you can use the printf() function. These function takes a string or character and then output's it to the screen. i.e printf("My name is is Terry"); outputs. 'My name is Terry'. Now your challenge is to print the string "Hello World!". NB: This is an important string that you will output whenever you learn to wrie any program.
